attributes.action: Save our children, change building regulations so that "no further Schools or Housing will be constructed within 500 metres of a major source of exhaust emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A 10 year study reported on 26/1/07
 ” The chemicals contained in exhaust emissions adversely affect the development of lungs throughout childhood, their powerful oxidant effect on lung development restricts the growth in the first five to eight years of life” the vehicle exhaust fumes stunts the lung growth by as much as one third, at the same time causing all kinds of bronchial problems the worst one of all being asthma,” this warning states that all children living within 500 metres of a major road will be affected.  
 
When council members are voting, material planning regulations do NOT include, Health issues,  consequently under present legislation, no consideration whatsoever is given to the effect of exhaust fumes on children’s health, Asthma kills children.
 
No further housing or Schools to be constructed within 500 metres of a major source of exhaust emmissions,
